item.description:
Note: Make sure you call and purchase tickets in advance. Ticket costs vary depending where you sit and bringing friends, make sure to by tickets together because they are assigned seating.

Madame White Snake

Music by Zhou Long, Libretto by Cerise Lim Jacobs

A ground breaking opera inspired by one of the most romantic and beloved Chinese legends, Madame White Snake is a thrilling must-see event! Internationally-renowned soprano Ying Huang stars in the title role of a powerful snake spirit who becomes human to experience love but whose dream is undone by doubt and distrust as her husband grows suspicious about her fateful secret.

www.madamewhitesnake.com

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Madame Whitesnake
